title: Did Belusi delete Twitt, who offered to promote tourism in Chinatown?
subtitle: The President ' s spokesman for the United States House of Representatives, who was targeted for her visit to San Francisco in February 2020, had a very difficult tweet.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: Nancy Belusi's Twitter account deleted a tweet showing encouraging tourism to Chinatown weeks after President Donald Trump closed the American border to China.
